verses.text: \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w also|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*: ‘\w Listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w leaders|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, judges \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Is|strong="H3478"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* duty \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w*?

\w Haters|strong="H8130"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H7451"\w* \w which|strong="H7451"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H2896"\w* lovers \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*!

‘\w They|strong="H5921"\w* devour \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w hide|strong="H5785"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w strip|strong="H6584"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H6584"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w break|strong="H6476"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w pieces|strong="H6566"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* serve \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w meat|strong="H1320"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pot|strong="H5518"\w* \w or|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cooking|strong="H5518"\w* pan!

‘\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* pay \w attention|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* committed \w such|strong="H1931"\w* crimes.’

\w Therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w To|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w lead|strong="H8582"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w astray|strong="H8582"\w*, \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* food \w between|strong="H4421"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w declare|strong="H6942"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w puts|strong="H5414"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w open|strong="H5414"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*!

‘\w Night|strong="H3915"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w no|strong="H5030"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2821"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w no|strong="H5030"\w* \w divination|strong="H7080"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w go|strong="H8121"\w* \w down|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w dark|strong="H2821"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

‘\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w seers|strong="H2374"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H2374"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H2659"\w*, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w diviners|strong="H7080"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* turn pale, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w cover|strong="H5844"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouths|strong="H8222"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H2374"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w answer|strong="H4617"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* God.

‘\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3478"\w*, \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* contrary \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sense \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H5046"\w* \w known|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* crime, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.

‘\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w leaders|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, judges \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* spurn \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H8085"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w straight|strong="H3477"\w* \w crooked|strong="H6140"\w*,

\w who|strong="H3389"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w with|strong="H3389"\w* acts \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w bloodshed|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w with|strong="H3389"\w* \w crime|strong="H1818"\w*.

‘\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w leaders|strong="H7218"\w* render \w judgment|strong="H8199"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bribe|strong="H7810"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* give \w oracles|strong="H3384"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w reward|strong="H7810"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w divine|strong="H7080"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*. \w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* claim \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w rely|strong="H8172"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*”, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* say, “\w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w*. \w Evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.”

‘\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w sakes|strong="H1558"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w plowed|strong="H2790"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w heap|strong="H5856"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w ruins|strong="H5856"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wooded height.’
